name: Spectoria
description:
A 100% tickling focused work!

Treasure Hunter Ria enters some ancient ruins
in search of a treasure said to hold massive magical powers...
"Super Magic Spector". But awaiting her was...

  • 3 stages
  • 18 types of in battle tickling attacks
  • 3 defeat event scenes

  • 9 tickling traps

  • Difficulty can be altered

  • Reminiscence room implemented
